basics.name: Information Technology Bureau Deputy Director
basics.label: Senior Information Technology Professional
basics.summary: Senior Information Technology Professional with more than fifteen years of experience directing and managing large and complex IT Operations and Data Center.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Oversee and lead the Infrastructure & Operations IT Service, 24x7.
highlights: Oversees a department of 140 contractors and employees.
Manages infrastructure data network of 9,300 users, 250 sites.
Evaluates direct cutting edge technology solutions for the implementation of 53 IT projects.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Provided technical leadership to a data center and technical supervision of analysts, programmers, database administrators, and network as well as the support personnel.
highlights: Developed an innovation and technological portfolio of IT projects in Vocational Rehabilitation Administration.
Supported department documentation digitalization initiatives at the Department of Labor.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Delivered technical direction for a multimillion dollar Monitoring and Controlling System.
highlights: The total amount managed was 185 plants of filtration water and sewer water treatment with 1,540 facilities through the PR Island.

SCADA - Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition. Technical supervised the software analyst, programmers and database administrators during the software development and implementations of Department of Health compliance systems.
